data.comment: The match has started at CenturyLink Field.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Portland.
Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Sebastian Blanco.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Sebastian Blanco (Portland) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Marvin Loria.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Ismail Elfath signals a Seattle throw-in in Portland's half.
Seattle to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Can Portland get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Eryk Williamson puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Diego Valeri with an assist there.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seattle.
At CenturyLink Field, Portland are penalized for being offside.
Seattle are whistled for offside.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of Portland.
Goal kick for Portland at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Jordan Morris (Seattle) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Seattle.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Free kick Portland.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 23, Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Seattle.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Portland needs to be cautious. Seattle have an attacking throw-in.
Portland have a goal kick.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, Important block from the Portland defence as Kelvin Leerdam fires in a strike for Seattle.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The match at CenturyLink Field has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jorge Villafana, who is down injured.
In the minute 31, Joao Paulo for Seattle gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ismail Elfath awards Portland a goal kick.
Jorge Villafana for Portland is back on the field again.
In the minute 33, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a Portland throw-in in Seattle's half.
In the minute 35, In Seattle, Chris Duvall of Portland is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Jordan Morris is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Seattle to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 37, Can Seattle capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Seattle are coming forward and Nicolas Lodeiro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Seattle's Jordan Morris is back in action after a slight knock.
In Seattle Seattle drive forward through Jordan Morris. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 41, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of Portland.
Kelvin Leerdam grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ismail Elfath will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Seattle to check on Dario Zuparic, who is grimacing with pain.
Seattle's Cristian Roldan has been booked in Seattle.
The second-half is underway at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 46, Seattle drive upfield and Raul Ruidiaz gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Portland defender.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a second substitution, with Julio Cascante replacing Larrys Mabiala.
Dario Zuparic is back on the pitch.
In the minute 47, Seattle are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Seattle.
Jorge Villafana (Portland) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 50, Portland drives forward and Jaroslaw Niezgoda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Jeremy Ebobisse gets his shot on target but fails to score for Portland.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Portland's Julio Cascante misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seattle.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Seattle.
Attention is being given to Seattle’s Jordy Delem and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 57, Free kick Seattle.
Jordy Delem is back on his feet again.
Free kick in a good position for Portland!
In the minute 59, Portland's Diego Valeri breaks free at CenturyLink Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ismail Elfath awards Seattle a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Portland.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 62, Will Bruin (Seattle) has replaced the possibly injured Jordy Delem.
Seattle to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Seattle.
Jordan Morris (Seattle) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Seattle.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Portland in the half of Seattle.
Giovanni Savarese is making the team's fourth substitution at CenturyLink Field with Felipe Mora replacing Jaroslaw Niezgoda.
Yimmi Chara is replacing Marvin Loria for the away team.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Throw-in for Portland at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Portland in the half of Seattle.
At CenturyLink Field, Will Bruin has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in Seattle.
In the minute 78, Portland have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Portland will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Seattle.
Chris Duvall (Portland) has received a yellow card from Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 80, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Ismail Elfath signals a Seattle throw-in in Portland's half.
The home team have replaced Jordan Morris with Miguel Ibarra. This is the second substitution made today by Brian Schmetzer.
In the minute 81, Nouhou Tolo is replacing Joevin Jones for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Seattle's Cristian Roldan goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Felipe Mora is on target to give Portland a 1-2 advantage.
In the minute 83, Great play from Eryk Williamson to set up the goal.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Free kick Seattle.
In the minute 86, Diego Chara (Portland) gets a yellow card.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Portland just outside Seattle's area.
Portland make their fifth substitution with Bill Tuiloma replacing Diego Valeri.
In the minute 89, Brian Schmetzer (Seattle) is making a fourth substitution, with Handwalla Bwana replacing Shane O'Neill.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Raul Ruidiaz (Seattle) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
Eryk Williamson is booked for the away team.
